text: @EnvAgencySE we (local concerned residents) spent the day doing your job. When are you going to help? A start would be to hold @thameswater to account and stop them releasing sewage into our river. We filled a large dump truck with plastic, sanitary waste, taurpaulin. (More) https://t.co/4CyhSUE6wL

We live in NUL @NewsNBC The Town where STENCH is the norm, where VILE is the fragrance of spring, where TRASHED is the status of an entire community @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WHO @MPGeorgeEustice @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe

@wallyhallpark @AnglingTrust @EnvAgency @janeagallagher @bloodyromans @lpoolcouncil @sharonconnor28 @MikeBrown_LSSL @ChrisGPackham Ahh,  that's what was going on.  I'll have a closer look next time I'm in.

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL The wind must have changed around 3am, stench was back & another nights sleep ruined for all, we can't carry on living this nightmare at the hands of landfill operator, what will they do? meet the thresholds for one day 30/4, tick a few boxes then back to stink.

@Beeron1030 @Colne_Valley @ColneCAN @GeorgeMonbiot @bwebster135 @BBCPanorama @RiverChess @EnvAgency @Chilternstreams @BorisJohnson @Hillingdon @HillingdonTimes @theriverstrust @HillingdonMayor @Hillingdon_Tory @WildLondon I do hope you are right. Chalk streams & rivers are a rare habitat in need of protection from pollution. 

https://t.co/auGYrwxSF6

urls.title: UK rivers and chalk streams | WWF
urls.description: The picturesque rivers flowing through the British landscape is a vital source of fresh freshwater for homes, businesses and wildlife. Also, the majority of the world's precious and unique chalk streams are found in England, which makes it all the more special and worth protecting.Â
